welcome.rules: Welcome to Sale, the drinking game! Press to reveal a card. The most sober one goes first.

0.rules: Everyone starts drinking, and you can stop only when the player to your right stops or the drink runs out. The cardholder can stop whenever they want.

2.rules: The cardholder drinks, the player to the left drinks two, the one to their left drinks three, and so on until it reaches the cardholder.
2.penalty: Penalty: number of sips based on players

3.rules: The cardholder deals four sips to chosen players.

4.rules: The cardholder says a word, and the player to the left comes up with a rhyme, then the one to their left, and so on until it reaches the cardholder. Three sips for failure.

5.rules: All players point to the person they think is the most sober. The one with the most votes drinks three sips.

6.rules: The cardholder comes up with a category and says something related to that category. Progressing to the left, everyone must say something related. Two sips for failure.

7.rules: The cardholder creates a rule that everyone must follow or removes one previous rule if desired. Breaking the rule results in a penalty of two sips.

9.rules: The cardholder becomes the Question Master, and any existing Question Master relinquishes the title. If someone answers the Question Master's question, they must drink two sips.

10.rules: Players sitting to the left and right of the cardholder drink a sip.

11.rules: The cardholder chooses a player to be their sheep. The sheep must drink the same number of sips as the cardholder. Sheep can be chained if desired.

12.rules: The last player to shout "Sale" loses and drinks. Remaining silent also results in a loss.

51.rules: Rare Spade-Sale. All players must finish their drinks as quickly as possible.

52.rules: All players drink a glass of water.

53.rules: The cardholder must take a shot of booze.
